QuestData.Title: Last Toll of the Yaungol
QuestData.Description: Ban has asked me to explore the village to determine what happened here.$B$BI noticed smoke rising up from the east, the west, northwest, and the south.$B$BI need someone I trust to watch my back.$B$BWhat do you say? Want to help me on my first scouting mission?
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Xiao Tu to the smoke trails at Hatred's Vice.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for your help, $n.$B$BWe cannot know exactly what happened here, but it's clear that something caused the yaungol to turn on one another.$B$BWhat kind of power could do this?
